content.rendered:
Directed by Lucy Forbes. Tom Kingsley.

Written by Adam Kay.

Cast  Ambika Mod( Shruti ) . Rory Fleck Byrne( Harry ) . Michele Austin( Tracy ) . Alex Jennings( Mr. Lockhart ) . Ashley McGuire( Miss Houghton / … ) . Harriet Walter( Veronique ) . Kadiff Kirwan( Julian ) . Tom Durant Pritchard( Greg ) . Hannah Onslow( Erika Van Hegen ) . Rosie Akerman( Paula Van Hegen ) . Philippa Dunne( Ria ) . Michael Workeye( Ben ) . Josie Walker( Non-Reassuring Trace ) . Agata Jarosz( Agnieska ) . Grace Cookey-Gam( Amie ) . Alice Orr-Ewing( Emma ) . Sara Kestelman( Mrs. Winnicka ) . Alison Arellano( Paediatric Nurse ) . Bally Gill( Dave ) . George Somner( Al ) . Anil Goutam( Shruti’s Dad ) . Mita Rahman( Shruti’s Mom / … ) . Michael Simkins( Stephen ) . James Corrigan( Welly ) . Ross Tomlinson( PJ ) . Muki Zubis( Anaesthetist ) . Anil Desai( Man on Tube ) . Yasmin Wilde( Benilda ) . Johanna K. Lumi( Neonatal Nurse Anna Becker ) . Jack Wilkinson( Daniel Farrell ) . Ani Nelson( Nicola ) . Andreea Paduraru( Andrea ) . Beru Tessema( Dan ) . Rebecca Deren( GP ) . Risha Silvera( Scrub Nurse ) . Heather Coombs( Supermarket Supervisor Sharon Roberts ) . Anna Leong Brophy( Ali ) . Hiftu Quasem( Joyce ) . Adam Kay( Cyclist ) . Marcel Dorian( Andrea’s Husband ) . Alice Bailey Johnson( Callie ) . Joshua Higgott( Impatient Husband ) . Chanel Waddock( Ruth ) . Lucy Russell( Serena ) . Sarah Durham( Anna ) . Charlotte Arrowsmith( Jessica ) . Georgia Frost( Corry ) . Barney-Joe Jones( Drunk Man ) . Clea Martin( Layla ) . Oliver Birch( Gavin ) . Daniel Fearn( Workman ) . Farah Sardar( A&E Nurse ) . Mariam Haque( Jas ) . Clare Fraenkel( Nina ) . Hubert Hanowicz( Petr ) . Jade Johnson( Triage Patient ) . Josef Davies( Medieval Costume Man ) . Ricky Champ( Rob ) . Helen Phillips( Triage Patient ) . Carol MacReady( German Professor ) . Claire Richardson( Medieval Costume Woman ) . Roxy Faridany( Cardiology Registrar ) . Sara Hazemi( Triage Patient ) . Stacey Norris( Matilda ) . Georgia Maguire( Triage Patient ) . Edward Shaw( Ernie ) . Angelica Sacrepaye( Triage Patient ) . Simon Harrison( Angus ) . Amanda Ryan( Mindy ) . Nansi Nsue( Triage Patient ) . Natalia Judge-Fernandez( Triage Patient ) . Bronwyn James( Teri ) . Al Roberts( James ) . Ellie Beaven( Anna ) . Jason Forbes( Ian ) . Thomas Aldridge( Mark ) . Liz Carr( Tina ) . Andrew Ellis( Carl ) . Cathy Murphy( Harry’s Mum ) . Harki Bhambra( Huck ) . Alice Haig( Outpatients Nurse ) . Ross Hatt( Workshop Attendee ) . Sophie Winkleman( Kathleen Mullender ) . Anna Andresen( Trishni ) . Rakiya Hasan( Workshop Attendee ) . Richard Thomson( Trishni’s Boyfriend ) . Sarah Daniela Seggari( Workshop Attendee ) . Yinka Awoni( James ) . Katie Mulgrew( Cesarean Patient ) . Helen Cripps( Psych Reg ) . Abhin Galeya( Dr. Chowdry ) . Bhavik C. Pankhania( Chris ) . Layo-Christina Akinlude( Chid ) . Paul Foulds( Priest ) . Chris Hespel( Waiter ) . Claudia Jolly( Medical Registrar ) . Mai Weisz( A&E Nurse ) . Christopher Logan( A&E Registrar ) . Roshni Rathore( Naureen ) . Daniel Ward( Paul ) . Ashley Cook( Minister ) . Kaleem Janjua( Elderly Hindi Patient ) . Hugo Salter( Waiter ) . James Benson( Minister ) . Jonathan Jaynes( Briana’s Dad ) . Sophie Ormond( Briana ) . Deborah Wastell( Toastmaster ) . Tuyen Do( Laura ) . Jack Barry( Tim ) . Bella Heesom( ODP ) . Ella Dacres( Paramedic ) . Marion Bailey( Callie’s Mother ) . James Lee Williams( Drag Queen ) . Heather Agyepong( Rachel ) . Andrew Nolan( Graham ) . Dywayne Thomas( Midwife Liam Henry (uncredited) ) . Julia Westcott-Hutton( Grandmother (uncredited) ) . Anastasia Zabarchuk( Patient (uncredited) ) . Pierre Bergman( Hospital Visitor (uncredited) ) . Lukas DiSparrow( Pawel (uncredited) ) . Lasco Atkins( Murse (uncredited) ) . Doug Berry( Hospital Workman (uncredited) ) . Emilia Karlsson( Expectant Mother (uncredited) ) . Sanj Surati( Doctor (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Naomi De Pear. Jane Featherstone. Geraldine Hawkins. Kristin Jones. Adam Kay. James Kay. Hsinyi Liu. Dan McDermott. Holly Pullinger. Mona Qureshi. Ben Whishaw.

Production British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC). Sister Pictures. Terrible Productions.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 7

Status Finished (2022–2022)
